content: knit 18 sts m1l k1 repeat marker slm k1fb knit to end = 48 sts once you should have 44 sts at the end of the next row k all round next row repeat last 2 row four times you next row k all for 5 row should have 56 sts at the end of all the repeats next row k all for 2 row next row k to marker remove marker place sts onto waste yarn 15 sts for the thumb remove marker co 2 using the backwards loop cast on knit to the end of the round = 43 sts pattern pictures notes © jellyplus 2020 || please do not use or sell items knit from this pattern for commercial purposes 3 continue body of the glove next row k all for 11 row next row k16 put 11 sts onto waste yarn sts for the 2nd finger co2 using the backwards loop cast on k16 = 34 sts 3rd to 5th finger next row k all for 17 row = 34 sts next row k14 k2tog k2 ssk knit until end of round = 32 sts next row k all next row k13 k2tog k2 ssk knit until end of round = 30 sts next row k all next row k1 ssk k9 k2tog k1 repeat once more = 26 sts next row k all next row k1 ssk k7 k2tog k1 repeat once more = 22 sts next row k all next row k1 ssk k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k1 ssk k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog = 12 sts leave a longer tail kitchener the remaining stitches together to close the top and while weaving in your ends close any remaining holes on top 2nd finger thumb put all 11 sts on needles pick up 7 sts put all 15 sts on needles pick up 5 sts in the next round decrease for 2 sts = 16 sts in the next round decrease for 2 =18 sts next row k all for 21 row next row k all for 13 row next row k1 ssk k2 k2tog k1 repeat one next row k1 ssk k3 k2tog k1 repeat one time = 12 sts time = 14 sts next row k1 ssk k2tog k1 repeat one time = next row k all 8 sts next row k1 ssk k1 k2tog k1 repeat one cut thread and pull yarn through the remaining time = 10 sts 8 sts next row k all next row k2tog until end of row = 5 sts cut thread and pull yarn through the remaining 5 sts pattern pictures notes © jellyplus 2020 || please do not use or sell items knit from this pattern for commercial purposes 4
